articles.title: Opinion: Why ‘Origin’ is the movie America needs right now - CNN
articles.description: The film “Origin,” like the book “Caste” on which it was based, offers a powerful framing for America’s racial divide, writes author and theologian Keith Magee.
articles.content: Editors Note:Keith Magee is senior fellow and visiting professor in cultural justice at University College London Institute for Innovation and Public Purpose. He is the author of Prophetic Justice: E… [+8036 chars]

articles.author: Sara Chernikoff
articles.title: How much do Americans spend on groceries each week? See chart - USA TODAY
articles.description: The average American spends $270 on groceries each week, Census data shows, but in some states you'll pay 20% more.
articles.content: A mix of inflation, supply-chain disruptions and an increased demand have caused food prices to steadily rise since the beginning of the pandemic. While inflation has come down from last summer's hig… [+2132 chars]

articles.author: Corrie Pelc
articles.title: Colon cancer deaths are on the rise while overall cancer deaths drop - Medical News Today
articles.description: Colorectal or colon cancer deaths are increasing, especially in younger Americans, even when overall cancer deaths are falling, according to new data from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
• New data from the American Cancer Society shows that colorectal cancer deaths have continued to increase.
  • Meanwhile, overall cancer deaths have decreased in the United States.
